body:
---

## What happened

(Ctrl+S) save code

## Version information

Android Studio `4.2 Beta 2` • Flutter plugin `io.flutter 52.1.2` • Dart plugin `202.8346`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

comment_data.body:
@dufei816 thanks for the report. Are you working on a windows machine?

Our latest dev release catches this error, and save will not be affected (If you want to try out that release, see instructions: https://github.com/flutter/flutter-intellij/wiki/Dev-Channel). In our upcoming release you should also no longer see this error message, so I'm going to close for now. Please comment again if you continue to see this problem in either the dev release or when v53 is released.

title: Flutter plugin
